content: my husband is a member of the base honor guard something of which he is very proud when i announced that i was going to make a coaster for our oversized ice cups which kept sweating all over the desk he asked me if i could design one with the symbol of the honor guard on it i told him that i would try - this coaster is the result unfortunately for my desk he took it to work with him and i was forced to make another set of coasters for use at home he treasures this little token i have made for him though and it is still in use years later
